short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Captures the raw intensity of nature and the balance between fire and ice

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Two majestic tigers clash in a dramatic battle, one ignited with fiery orange energy and the other illuminated by a radiant blue glow.
